alert.note: Alert for Lehigh; Upper Bucks; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lehigh, northwestern Montgomery and west central Bucks Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1158 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Lane, or 16 miles south of Allentown, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Allentown, Emmaus, Quakertown, Perkasie, Souderton, East Greenville, Schwenksville, Green Lane, Zionsville, Geryville, Spring Mount, Telford, Sellersville, Pennsburg, Coopersburg, Red Hill, Richlandtown, Trumbauersville, Silverdale and Harleysville. This includes the following highways... Northeast Extension between mile markers 34 and 51. Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 60 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
